sent.orig: Ambulances have 'AMBULANCE' printed in reverse on their bonnets.
sent.trans: 救护车发动机罩盖上标有逆序反向字母的AMBULANCE字样。

sent.orig: Special passageway for ambulance, no stay for non-ambulance, thanks for cooperation.
sent.trans: 救护车专用通道，非救护车请勿停留，谢谢合作！

sent.orig: Vernon zhong: a xing, a xing, a xing. Please call ambulance. Call ambulance. A xing.
sent.trans: 仲天骐：阿星，阿星，阿星。叫救护车，叫救护车啊，阿星。

sent.orig: Two ambulance men put Ben and the motorcyclist into the ambulance.
sent.trans: 两名救护人员把本和骑摩托车的人放进救护车里。

sent.orig: My cousin is a good driver and he can drive an ambulance.
sent.trans: 我的表哥是一位很好的驾驶员，他会驾驶救护车。
